properties.areaDesc: Wayne, WV; Putnam, WV; Cabell, WV; Lincoln, WV
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 4:02PM EST until January 11 at 4:30PM EST by NWS Charleston WV
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Southeastern Cabell County in central West Virginia...
Southwestern Putnam County in western West Virginia...
Northwestern Lincoln County in central West Virginia...
Northeastern Wayne County in western West Virginia...

* Until 430 PM EST.

* At 401 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of
Beech Fork State Park, moving northeast at 70 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Hamlin, Hurricane, Milton, Culloden, Teays Valley, West Hamlin and
Salt Rock.

This includes Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 27
and 36.
properties.instruction:
For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

Please report severe weather to the National Weather Service by
calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely.

You may also report severe weather by posting your report to the
Charleston West Virginia National Weather Service Facebook Page, or
by using the Twitter Hashtag, NWSRLX.
